sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Router, ActivatedRoute } from '@angular/router'; import { Store } from '@ngrx/store'; import { Observable } from 'rxjs'; import { Track } from '../../../../core/models/track.model'; import * as TrackActions from '../../../../core/store/track/track.actions'; import * as fromTrack from '../../../../core/store/track/track.selectors'; @Component({ selector: 'app-track-details', templateUrl: './track-details.component.html' }) export class TrackDetailsComponent implements OnInit { track$: Observable; constructor( private store: Store, private route: ActivatedRoute, private router: Router ) { this.track$ = this.store.select(fromTrack.selectCurrentTrack); } ngOnInit() { this.route.params.subscribe(params => { const trackId = Number(params['id']); this.store.dispatch(TrackActions.loadTrack({ id: trackId })); }); } playTrack(track: Track) { this.store.dispatch(TrackActions.playTrack({ track })); } goBack() { this.router.navigate(['/library']); } }

{{ track.title }}

{{ track.artist }}

{{ track.category }}

{{ track.addedDate | date:'medium' }}
